verses.text: \w For|strong="H1732"\w* \w the|strong="H1732"\w* choirmaster. \w A|strong="H3068"\w* \w Psalm|strong="H4210"\w* \w of|strong="H4210"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*. Hear, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God, \w my|strong="H1732"\w* voice \w of|strong="H4210"\w* complaint; preserve \w my|strong="H1732"\w* life from dread \w of|strong="H4210"\w* \w the|strong="H1732"\w* enemy.

Hide \w me|strong="H6963"\w* \w from|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* scheming \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* wicked, \w from|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* mob \w of|strong="H6963"\w* workers \w of|strong="H6963"\w* iniquity,
\w who|strong="H7489"\w* sharpen \w their|strong="H5641"\w* tongues like swords \w and|strong="H6466"\w* aim \w their|strong="H5641"\w* bitter words like arrows,
ambushing \w the|strong="H1697"\w* innocent \w in|strong="H1697"\w* seclusion, shooting suddenly, without fear.

\w They|strong="H3808"\w* hold fast \w to|strong="H3372"\w* \w their|strong="H3808"\w* evil purpose; \w they|strong="H3808"\w* speak \w of|strong="H3372"\w* \w hiding|strong="H4565"\w* \w their|strong="H3808"\w* snares. “\w Who|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* see \w them|strong="H3384"\w*?” \w they|strong="H3808"\w* say.

\w They|strong="H1697"\w* devise injustice \w and|strong="H2388"\w* \w say|strong="H1697"\w*, “\w We|strong="H1697"\w* \w have|strong="H7200"\w* perfected \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w secret|strong="H2934"\w* \w plan|strong="H1697"\w*.” \w For|strong="H7451"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* inner \w man|strong="H7451"\w* \w and|strong="H2388"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* heart \w are|strong="H1697"\w* mysterious.

\w But|strong="H3820"\w* \w God|strong="H2664"\w* \w will|strong="H3820"\w* shoot \w them|strong="H7130"\w* \w with|strong="H3820"\w* arrows; suddenly \w they|strong="H3820"\w* \w will|strong="H3820"\w* \w be|strong="H3820"\w* wounded.

\w They|strong="H2671"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w made|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* stumble, \w their|strong="H1961"\w* \w own|strong="H1961"\w* tongues \w turned|strong="H1961"\w* against \w them|strong="H1961"\w*. All who see \w will|strong="H1961"\w* shake \w their|strong="H1961"\w* heads.

\w Then|strong="H7200"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* mankind \w will|strong="H3956"\w* fear \w and|strong="H7200"\w* proclaim \w the|strong="H3605"\w* work \w of|strong="H5921"\w* God; \w so|strong="H7200"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3956"\w* ponder \w what|strong="H7200"\w* \w He|strong="H3605"\w* \w has|strong="H3605"\w* \w done|strong="H3605"\w*.

\w Let|strong="H5046"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* righteous rejoice \w in|strong="H7919"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3372"\w* take refuge \w in|strong="H7919"\w* \w Him|strong="H5046"\w*; \w let|strong="H5046"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* upright \w in|strong="H7919"\w* heart exult.
